translations: adj.（动物）捕食性的，食肉的；掠夺性的，弱肉强食的

phrs.translation: 掠夺性订价；掠夺性价格

sentences.sentence: Predatory pricing by large supermarkets was threatening the livelihood of smaller businesses.
sentences.translation: 大型超市的掠夺性定价正威胁着小商店的生计。

sentences.sentence: People will not set up new businesses while they are frightened by the predatory behaviour of the banks.
sentences.translation: 人们在被银行的掠夺行为惊吓的情况下是不会开办新企业的。

sentences.sentence: Ants keep predatory insects away from where their aphids feed; Gmail keeps the spammers out of our inboxes.
sentences.translation: 蚂蚁让食肉昆虫远离蚜虫的觅食处；Gmail 使垃圾邮件发送人远离我们的收件箱。
